description:
After becoming a class committee member along with Airi, Shingo struggled to improve the atmosphere in the class. Gradually the classmates started to get along, but Airi alone continued to keep a distance from Shingo. One evening in the classroom, when Airi was having trouble finishing her committee duties, Shingo offered her a suggestion...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: イライラ色のドキドキ
